title: Spell Me the Truth
description: When Amilou Polowski moved to Taylor's Falls right before the start of her junior year, all she wanted was to make new friends and win a spot on the cheer squad. She did not expect to find out that everyone in town thought her house was cursed.Yet cursed it is, as Amilou and her friends discover when they fall victim at her slumber party. Can they reverse it before it is too late? Or will they have to live with the consequences forever?
author: Cat Francis
